scripts.postinstall: node ./decorate-angular-cli.js && ngcc --properties es2015 browser module main
scripts.benchmark:build:cold: hyperfine --prepare 'rm -rf node_modules/.cache .angular/' 'NX_DAEMON=false yarn nx build app0' --export-json results/build-current-version-cold.json
scripts.benchmark:build:cache: hyperfine --warmup 1 'NX_DAEMON=false yarn nx build app0' --export-json results/build-current-version-cache.json
scripts.benchmark:test:cold: hyperfine 'NX_DAEMON=false yarn nx run-many --target=test --all --skip-nx-cache' --prepare 'yarn jest --clearCache' --max-runs 5 --export-json results/test-current-version-cold.json
scripts.benchmark:lint:cold: hyperfine --prepare 'rm -rf node_modules/.cache .angular/' 'NX_DAEMON=false yarn nx run-many --target=lint --all' --export-json results/lint-current-version-cold.json
scripts.benchmark:e2e:cold: hyperfine --prepare 'rm -rf node_modules/.cache .angular/' 'NX_DAEMON=false yarn nx e2e app0' --export-json results/e2e-current-version-cold.json
